#include <bits/stdc++.h>

using namespace std;

int main(){
    int t;
    cin >> t;
    while(t--){
        int n;
        cin >> n;
        string s;
        int a,b,c,d;
        a=b=c=d=0;
        for(int i=1;i<=n;++i){
            cin >> s;
            if(s=="aa")
                ++a;
            if(s=="ab")
                ++b;
            if(s=="ba")
                ++c;
            if(s=="bb")
                ++d;

        }
        for(int i=1;i<=a/2;++i)
            cout << "aa";
        for(int i=1;i<=min(b,c);++i)
            cout << "ab";
        if(a%2==1){
            for(int i=1;i<=d/2;++i)
                cout << "bb";

            cout << "aa";

            for(int i=1;i<=d/2;++i)
                cout << "bb";

        }
        else{
            for(int i=1;i<=d;++i)
                cout << "bb";
        }
        for(int i=1;i<=min(b,c);++i)
                cout << "ba";
        for(int i=1;i<=a/2;++i)
                cout << "aa";
        cout << endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
